::: Megatron stood at a railing that overlooked the entire vast bridge. He 
turned to Panzertron. :::

::: Megatron ::: Your wepon is very impressive. Now, lets get real with each 
other, yes. I want to allign with you. Your weponry is fantastic and you seem 
a capable and intelligent Major. Together I belive we would dominate the 
Beast Wars. Yet....I would understand your hesitation into a pact with anyone 
at the momnet. If i were you, I think people were trying to become friends 
with me only to use your vessle. My team and i only wish to join you to 
eliminate the maximals and gather energon. No more. No less.

~~~~~~~~~

::: Demona looked to Inferno and pushed past him ::: Move insect, I need to 
talk with the Commander.

::: Demona walked up the open ramp into the main corridor and then made her 
way into the bridge which always seemed to be filled and busy with bots. :::

::: Hell Beast watched the pink T-Rex walk around several consols and stand 
in front of him. And he had to admit she was incedibly irresistable. :::

::: Demona ::: Terorize!

::: She transformed into her small, yet sexy robt mode. ::: 

::: Demona bowed ::: Hello Commander Hell Beast. My name is Demona.

::: Hell Beast ::: You are quite good to look at...

::: Demona ::: So are you, Commander.

::: Hell Beast :: What are your qualifications?

::: Demona ::: I have a 10.0 intelligence rank. Besides that, I dont fight, 
ever.

::: Hell Beast ::: What? You must have other skills!

::: Demona ::: I rely on my witts. If that isnt good enough for you, mabey i 
should be leading this group.

::: Hell Beast snarled ::: Power hungry fembot! You will learn your place!

::: Demona ::: Stop screaming and do it!

::: Hell Beast raised his hand, but could not slap the grinning face of the 
pink Demona. :::

::: Demona ::: Thats what I thought, coward. Im going to get some quarters, 
and then I will talk with you. There will be alot of changes around here.

::: She began to walk off and then turned to Black Aracnia and 
Pheniox ::: Drop in later, we need to talk. And bring any other female 
predacons with you. Things are gonna change around here.
